title: See How Selena Gomez Reacted When Her Makeup Artist Made A Joke About Justin Bieber & The Weeknd!
text:
Her makeup artist is savage!
Selena Gomez had to be a good sport when her makeup artist Hung Vanngo made a joke about her love life.
Related: Selena Talks Bullying At Disney 
The two were goofing off when Hung commented with a very apt observation about the types of men Selenita gravitates towards.
Watch the clip (below)! 
üòÇüò©üëèüèª pic.twitter.com/CVxdpw4bN8

HA! Come on, Selly, he's only telling the truth.
As you know, Justin Bieber and The Weeknd both hail from Canadialand.
Loves it!
